MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH62, CH64 and CH66 postcode areas of Neston, Hooton and Willaston, affecting properties in Benty Heath Lane, Beech Hey Lane, Field Hey Lane, Street Hey Lane and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further network investigations required and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:43PM on 28th October 2020.
